Body:
z = np.linspace(0.0, 1.0, 2000)
n = dndz(z)
b = np.sqrt(1.0 + z)
if tracer_type == 'nc':
    ntr = 3
    tr = ccl.NumberCountsTracer(COSMO, True, dndz=(z, n), bias=(z, b),
        mag_bias=(z, b))
elif tracer_type == 'wl':
    ntr = 2
    tr = ccl.WeakLensingTracer(COSMO, dndz=(z, n), ia_bias=(z, b))
elif tracer_type == 'cl':
    ntr = 1
    tr = ccl.CMBLensingTracer(COSMO, 1100.0)
else:
    ntr = 0
    tr = ccl.Tracer()
return tr, ntr
